mapper.select: SELECT pt.pay_type_name name,count(*) y from t_trade t LEFT JOIN t_pay_type pt ON t.pay_type = pt.pay_type_id GROUP BY pt.pay_type_id

SELECT pt.pay_type_name name,count(*) y,DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') time, t.pay_type type from t_trade t LEFT JOIN t_pay_type pt ON t.pay_type = pt.pay_type_id where DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_SUB(curdate(),INTERVAL ${i} day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),pt.pay_type_name ORDER BY t.create_time
